title: Vision. [No. 31]
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Social life and customs
description: Cinemagazine: Magic Castle - a private club for magicians in Hollywood Hills; Aerial logging - huge helium balloons lift fallen logs from a steep hillside and carry them to the timberyard; Chuck Huntington - Ramsay Junior High School in Minnesota has an artist-in-residence who creates objects with a blowtorch and junk materials; Brain pacemaker - a new pacemaker for the brain; Old time fiddlers - today, amateur fiddlers in the US still travel miles to play, sing and pass along the tunes of their forefathers.
